page.title: 13Transport
page.content: This rural area is poorly provided with public service transport.The bus services do not coincide with working hours so nearly everyone needs a car to get them from home to employment,or there is a need for giving lifts, an unofficial taxi service. Taxis are used extensively by those who have no other means of getting into the nearby town for shopping or connections for travel to major centres,for local surgeries-Doctor, Dentist or the hospital, library or leisure activities. Occassionally businesses who employ people who live in the Village have to provide transport-cars or vans-for the employee to commute.
